member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of a command list.

member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE.D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE_DIRECT
member.summary: Specifies a command buffer that the GPU can execute. A direct command list doesn't inherit any GPU state.

member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE.D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE_BUNDLE
member.summary: Specifies a command buffer that can be executed only directly via a direct command list. A bundle command list inherits all GPU state (except for the currently set pipeline state object and primitive topology).

member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE.D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE_COMPUTE
member.summary: Specifies a command buffer for computing.

member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE.D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE_COPY
member.summary: Specifies a command buffer for copying.

member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE.D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE_VIDEO_DECODE
member.summary: Specifies a command buffer for video decoding.

member.name: D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE.D3D12_COMMAND_LIST_TYPE_VIDEO_PROCESS
member.summary: Specifies a command buffer for video processing.
